scripts.add-android: cd ./cordova && cordova platforms add android && cordova prepare android && cd ..
scripts.create-ios-debug: npm run build-prod && npm run prepare-ios
scripts.create-ios-release: npm run build-prod && npm run prepare-ios-release
scripts.build-android: cd ./cordova cd ./cordova && cordova build android && cd ..
scripts.build-android-release: cd ./cordova && rm -f platforms/android/build/outputs/apk/release/android-release-unsigned.apk && cordova build android --release && cd ..
scripts.create-android-debug: npm run build-prod && npm run build-android
scripts.create-android-release: npm run build-prod && npm run build-android-release
scripts.sign-android-release: cd ./cordova && rm -f platforms/android/build/outputs/apk/release/android-release-signed.apk && jarsigner -storepass Sid@Dev2K -keystore firstkeystore platforms/android/build/outputs/apk/release/android-release-unsigned.apk firstkeystore && ./zipalign -v 4 platforms/android/build/outputs/apk/release/android-release-unsigned.apk platforms/android/build/outputs/apk/release/android-release-signed.apk && cd ..
scripts.create-sign-android-release: npm run create-android-release && npm run sign-android-release
